Constructor

public new()
The HxlSound constructor gets all the variables initialized, but NOT ready to play a sound yet.

public acceleration : HxlPoint

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
How fast the speed of this object is changing. Useful for smooth movement and gravity.

public active : Bool

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
If an object is not alive, the game loop will not automatically call update() on it.

public alwaysVisible : Bool

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
If true, object is not affected by autoVisible.

public angle : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Set the angle of a sprite to rotate it. WARNING: rotating sprites decreases rendering performance for this sprite by a factor of 10x!

public angularAcceleration : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
How fast the spin speed should change.

public angularDrag : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Like drag but for spinning.

public angularVelocity : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
This is how fast you want this sprite to spin.

public artist : String

The ID3 artist name. Defaults to null. Currently only works for streamed sounds.

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
This isn't drag exactly, more like deceleration that is only applied when acceleration is not affecting the sprite.

public maxAngular : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Use in conjunction with angularAcceleration for fluid spin speed control.

public maxThrust : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Used to cap thrust, helpful and easy!

public maxVelocity : HxlPoint

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
If you are using acceleration, you can use maxVelocity with it to cap the speed automatically (very useful!).

public moves : Bool

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Set this to false if you want to skip the automatic motion/movement stuff (see updateMotion()). FlxObject and FlxSprite default to true. FlxText, FlxTileblock, FlxTilemap and FlxSound default to false.

public name : String

The ID3 song name. Defaults to null. Currently only works for streamed sounds.

public origin : HxlPoint

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
WARNING: The origin of the sprite will default to its center. If you change this, the visuals and the collisions will likely be pretty out-of-sync if you do any rotation.

public playing : Bool

Whether the sound is currently playing or not.

public right(getRight,null) : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlRect

public right(getRight,null) : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlRect

public scrollFactor : HxlPoint

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
A point that can store numbers from 0 to 1 (for X and Y independently) that governs how much this object is affected by the camera subsystem. 0 means it never moves, like a HUD element or far background graphic. 1 means it scrolls along a the same speed as the foreground layer. scrollFactor is initialized as (1,1) by default.

public solid(getSolid,setSolid) : Bool

inherited from haxel.HxlObject

public survive : Bool

Whether or not this sound should be automatically destroyed when you switch states.

public thrust : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
If you want to do Asteroids style stuff, check out thrust, instead of directly accessing the object's velocity or acceleration.

public top(getTop,null) : Float

inherited from haxel.HxlRect

inherited from haxel.HxlRect

inherited from haxel.HxlObject

inherited from haxel.HxlPoint

public destroy() : Void

overrides haxel.HxlObject
The basic class destructor, stops the music and removes any leftover events.

public fadeIn(Seconds : Float) : Void

parameters
Seconds The amount of time the fade-in operation should take.
Call this function to make a sound fade in over a certain time interval (calls play() automatically).

public fadeOut(Seconds : Float, ?PauseInstead : Bool) : Void

parameters
Seconds The amount of time the fade out operation should take.
PauseInstead Tells the sound to pause on fadeout, instead of stopping.
Call this function to make this sound fade out over a certain time interval.

inherited from haxel.HxlRect
The Y coordinate of the bottom of the rectangle. Read-only.

inherited from haxel.HxlObject

inherited from haxel.HxlRect

inherited from haxel.HxlRect

public getScreenXY(?Point : HxlPoint) : HxlPoint

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
parameters
P Takes a Point object and assigns the post-scrolled X and Y values of this object to it.
returns
The Point you passed in, or a new Point if you didn't pass one, containing the screen X and Y position of this object.
Call this function to figure out the on-screen position of the object.

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Set solid to true if you want to collide this object.

inherited from haxel.HxlRect
The Y coordinate of the top of the rectangle. Read-only.

public getVolume() : Float

Set volume to a value between 0 and 1 to change how this sound is.

private gotID3(?event : flash.events.Event) : Void

parameters
event An Event object.
Internal event handler for ID3 info (i.e. fetching the song name).

private init() : Void

An internal function for clearing all the variables used by sounds.

public kill() : Void

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Call this function to "kill" a sprite so that it no longer 'exists'.

public loadEmbedded(EmbeddedSound : Class<flash.media.Sound>, ?Looped : Bool) : HxlSound

parameters
EmbeddedSound An embedded Class object representing an MP3 file.
Looped Whether or not this sound should loop endlessly.
returns
This FlxSound instance (nice for chaining stuff together, if you're into that).
One of two main setup functions for sounds, this function loads a sound from an embedded MP3.

public loadStream(SoundURL : String, ?Looped : Bool) : HxlSound

parameters
EmbeddedSound A string representing the URL of the MP3 file you want to play.
Looped Whether or not this sound should loop endlessly.
returns
This FlxSound instance (nice for chaining stuff together, if you're into that).
One of two main setup functions for sounds, this function loads a sound from a URL.

private looped(?event : flash.events.Event) : Void

parameters
event An Event object.
An internal helper function used to help Flash resume playing a looped sound.

public onScreen() : Bool

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
returns
Whether the object is on screen or not.
Check and see if this object is currently on screen.

public overlapsPoint(X : Float, Y : Float, ?PerPixel : Bool) : Bool

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
parameters
X The X coordinate of the point.
Y The Y coordinate of the point.
PerPixel Whether or not to use per pixel collision checking (only available in HxlSprite subclass).
returns
Whether or not the point overlaps this object.
Checks to see if a point in 2D space overlaps this HxlObject object.

public pause() : Void

Call this function to pause this sound.

public play() : Void

Call this function to play the sound.

public proximity(X : Float, Y : Float, Core : HxlObject, Radius : Float, ?Pan : Bool) : HxlSound

parameters
X The X position of the sound.
Y The Y position of the sound.
Core The object you want to track.
Radius The maximum distance this sound can travel.
returns
This HxlSound instance (nice for chaining stuff together, if you're into that).
Call this function if you want this sound's volume to change based on distance from a particular HxlCore object.

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Override this function to draw graphics (see HxlSprite).

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
parameters
X The new X position of this object.
Y The new Y position of this object.
Handy function for reviving game objects. Resets their existence flags and position, including LAST position.

inherited from haxel.HxlObject

public stop() : Void

Call this function to stop this sound.

private stopped(?event : flash.events.Event) : Void

parameters
event An Event object.
An internal helper function used to help Flash clean up and re-use finished sounds.

public toString() : String

inherited from haxel.HxlPoint

public update() : Void

overrides haxel.HxlObject
The basic game loop update function. Just calls updateSound().

private updateMotion() : Void

inherited from haxel.HxlObject
Internal function for updating the position and speed of this object. Useful for cases when you need to update this but are buried down in too many supers.

private updateSound() : Void

Internal function that performs the actual logical updates to the sound object. Doesn't do much except optional proximity and fade calculations.

public updateTransform() : Void

An internal function used to help organize and change the volume of the sound.
